2 minutes to #StarTrekHour! Remember to include the #StarTrekHour hashtag in your replies to the discussion questions. https://t.co/wsfbASJYVg
1 hour until #StarTrekHour! I'll tweet discussion questions. You include the #StarTrekHour hashtag in your answers. Newcomers are always welcome. https://t.co/wsfbASJYVg
